Senate confirms Pam Bondi to lead Justice Department  —  The Senate on Wednesday voted to confirm Pam Bondi as the next attorney general, giving her control of a Justice Department embroiled in controversy.  —  The vote was 54-46.  Sen. John Fetterman (D-Pa.) joined all Republicans in voting in support of Bondi.
